metadata.description: The war to end all wars has begun in Eternia! Hordak and the villainous Dark Horde have taken over Castle Grayskull and plan to use it as a weapon to terrorize and rule the universe. But a resistance is building led by She-Ra, The Sorceress Teela and the benevolent warrior He-Man!
metadata.name: He-Man: The Eternity War
